name: The Quest of Armadoge I
description:
What is The Quest of Armadoge?

The Quest of Armadoge is the first part of an indie game series by Spiral Galaxy Studios. It is currently being developed in the robust Game Maker Studio 2 game engine. Although development is early, you will be able to sign up to a closed beta, which will be help in the coming future (see threads and discussion pages to learn more). Please consider donating to Spiral Galaxy Studios today to make this and up coming projects even better.

Brief description of the Story line:

Julian wants to achieve his life long goal of finding the lost city of Armadoge. Not many people have bothered to spend weeks, months or even years to find Armadoge, but the ones who have came back were scared with dreadful memories of dangerous creatures who attempted to stop them in their paths. All of this didn't matter to Julian as he wasn't scared of anything! That's what he though anyway... Throughout his path he will face many death dangerous creatures while moving along the death defying landscape. Thankfully he has a Light Machine Gun to help fend off some of the monster who attack him. As he gets further, his weaponry and armor will become stronger, but the monsters will also become stronger. Does he find to city of Armadoge? That's for you to decide...      

Controls:
  • Move Left = A/Left Arrow Key
  • Move Right = D/Right Arrow Key
  • Jump = Space bar/Up Arrow Key
  • Shoot = Left Mouse Button (LMB)
  • Restart = R
  • Pause = ESC
System Requirements Minimum 
  • CPU - 1.6 GHz Intel Pentium (AMD equivalent)
  • GPU - Intel Integrated Graphics 500 (1 GB Vram)
  • Storage - 10 MB
  • Ram - 2 GB
  • OS - Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Architecture - x64
Recommended
  • CPU - 2 GHz i3 Intel Pentium (AMD equivalent)
  • GPU - Intel Integrated Graphics 500 (2 GB Vram)
  • Storage - 10 MB
  • Ram - 4 GB
  • OS - Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Architecture - x64
